name: @ericrabil/phea.js
description: Node.JS implementation of the Hue Entertainment API but it works
author: Eric Rabil <ericjrabil@gmail.com>

scripts.docgen: typedoc --excludePrivate --readme none --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin typedoc-plugin-no-inherit src/webrtc-dtls.d.ts src/index.ts
